title: Crew Show!
description: Once again the collective that is The Smoking Tire has reconvened after much traveling. Matt returns and regales us with his trip to Mexico, Zack and Thad made their way to northern California to film a Ford Falcon rally car and immediately thereafter Thad drove from Texas to California with Mike Musto in matching Charger and Challenger Hellcats with a brief stint in a Viper. Additionally we get a little nostalgic for Acuras of old, Jaguar reveals their plans for an all wheel drive F-Type R, information starts leaking on the Cadillac ATS-V and we debate engine possibilities for the new Mustang GT350.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)

Additionally we get a little nostalgic for Acuras of old, Jaguar reveals their plans for an all wheel drive F-Type R, information starts leaking on the Cadillac ATS-V and we debate engine possibilities for the new Mustang GT350.
